projects.name: QUOTE LEAD GEN
projects.overview: Nuxt based PWA with quote/lead gen booking system built with firebase backend. User auth, admin and user data with protected routes. Still a work in progress, should be completed shortly.

projects.name: E-COMMERCE WEBSITE
projects.overview: A set of vanilla JS E-commerce components using custom SASS mixins built with no frameworks. Handlebars templating with a Firebase backend and stripe payments. This is still a work in progress but it has a functional shopping cart and checkout system. Initially I was going to make a custom router, but I created a JAMstack static site with webpack chunks that lazy load on each route.
